content: {"name": "Patton Recreation Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "providing a 5pack of frozen meals for seniors 60 and up on Wednesdays. There is a limited number of meals and they are distributed on a first-come, first-served basis", "email": "", "url": "https://detroitmi.gov/departments/detroit-parks-recreation/recreation-centers/food-resources", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2301 Woodmere Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Springwells", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48209", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3094421, "longitude": -83.1378441}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "21:30", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "21:30", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "21:30", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "21:30", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": ""}]}
